welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Arida, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our quaint city known for its traditional culture and stunning scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Arida has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tokushima Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tokushima Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
